mapper.select: SELECT op.product_id productId, op.product_name productName, op.product_des productDes, op.product_img productImg, op.product_spec_value_name productSpecValueName, op.product_price productPirce, op.product_number productNumber FROM s_order_product op WHERE op.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}

SELECT od.create_time createTime, od.payment_time paymentTime, od.shipping_time shippingTime, case when od.order_status = 0 then '等待买家付款' when od.order_status = 1 then '买家已付款' when od.order_status = 2 then '卖家已发货' when od.order_status = 4 then '售后处理中' when od.order_status in(3, 5, -1) then '订单已关闭' end orderStatusName, od.address_name addressName, CONCAT(LEFT(od.address_phone,3), '*****' , RIGHT(od.address_phone,4)) adddressPhone, od.address_detail addressDetail, od.order_amount orderAmount, od.shipping_fee shippingFee, od.pay_amount payAmount, od.order_sn orderSn, od.shipping_code shippingCode, od.coupon_amount couponAmount
FROM s_order_detail od WHERE od.id = #{orderDetailId}

SELECT id, user_id userId, payment_type paymentType, payment_state paymentState, payment_time paymentTime, pay_amount payAmount, channel, create_time createTime FROM s_order WHERE payment_state = 1 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, payment_time, NOW()) >= 5
